Detailed Description

Abstract superclass for comment model objects.

AbstractComment is an abstract ancestor for every comment-like model class. Comment objects contain a small text, are linked to an author (not necessarily another model object) and can be permalinked.

Definition at line 15 of file abstract_comment.php.

Member Function Documentation

AbstractComment::init ( $  values  )  [protected]

Performs specialized initialization tasks.

Subclassers will use this method to perform custom initialization.

Note:
The default implementation simply does nothing.
Parameters:
values An array of column-value pairs to initialize the receiver.

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.

Reimplemented in DiarioPingback.
